document.topic_text:
SThree (STHR) SThree : Purchase in own shares
22-Aug-2016 / 08:57 GMT /BST Dissemination of a Regulatory Announcement that contains inside information, transmitted by EQS Group AG. The issuer is solely responsible for the content of this announcement.
SThree plc Purchase of own shares SThree plc (' SThree ' or the 'Company') announces that on 19 August 2016 , it purchased for treasury 5,000 ordinary shares of 1p each at a price of 255 pence per share. The highest price paid was 255p and lowest price paid was 245.5p. This represents 0.004 percent of the issued share capital of the Company. In accordance with Disclosure and Transparency Rule 5.6.1, following this purchase, there are 1,614,082 shares held in treasury and the total number of voting rights in SThree is 128,134,752 ordinary shares of 1p each. The above figure may be used by shareholders as the denominator for the calculations by which they will determine if they are required to notify their interest in, or a change to their interest in, SThree under the FCA's Disclosure and Transparency Rules. Hanisha Hands-Patel Senior Company Secretarial Assistant 0207 7268 6000
